briefTitle: Initial Evaluation of Ultra FAST Breast Magnetic Resonance in Breast Cancer Screening: Comparative Study With Mammography and Ultrasound.
officialTitle: Initial Evaluation of Ultra FAST Breast Magnetic Resonance in Breast Cancer Screening: Comparative Study With Mammography and Ultrasound.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: ACR five point rating scale for mammography images
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women referred for routine breast cancer screening

Exclusion Criteria:

* Disabled women (eg, unable to stand)
* Pregnant women
* Allergy to Gadolinium
